statements: UPDATE lighting_control SET natural_light_intensity=500, lighting_intensity=300 WHERE id=1;

UPDATE lighting_control SET automated_adjustment=TRUE, natural_light_intensity=50 WHERE location='Conference Room';

UPDATE LightingControl SET light_intensity = 70, auto_adjust = true WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE WeatherData SET humidity = 75.5, temperature = 27.3 WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE LightingControl SET light_intensity = 80, temperature_threshold = 25.5 WHERE light_zone = 2;
UPDATE weather_data SET temperature = 25.7, humidity = 65.2 WHERE city_name = 'New York';
UPDATE lighting_control SET automated = true, light_intensity = 75.2 WHERE control_id = 1;
UPDATE weather_data SET humidity = 60.5, temperature = 28.7 WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles';
UPDATE lighting_control SET light_intensity = 75.0, automated = true WHERE control_id = 3;
